Fields.DialogueText: So, where is... ah.
Hallo, Kappi!
You've come to visit me?

Fields.MenuText: Why, yes, U-37. Hello. How are you today? I hope all of your operations are nominal.
Where else would I be? We're on the same ship.
Seventeen straight hours of Morgana fire couldn't keep me away. Ask me how I know.

Fields.DialogueText: Er... that's a pretty cold reception, Kap.
I expected your personal visits to be more frequent.
Ha! You're pretty smooth, aren't you?
What... What do you have to say for yourself?
Just being myself. Take it or leave it.
Hmmm...
I do like that about you.

Fields.MenuText: Erm. Are you feeling all right?
Glad to hear it.
You really had to think about it for ten seconds before saying so?

Fields.DialogueText: Oh, don't be a bore.
Heh.
You're fun to pester.
*ALARM*
C'mon. We have a job to do.
Jawohl!
@BATTLE
Herzlich willkommen! This is more like it! You had some free time, so you stopped by.
Indeed I have. Hello.
Get close for a second... Mwah!
Whoa!
What's with your face? Did that bother you? Are you blushing, or is my kiss making you sick?

Fields.MenuText: Next time, brush your teeth before trying that.
No. It was nice.
It was... inappropriate.

Fields.DialogueText: Very funny, Kap. Besides, you didn't warn me that you were coming over!
Good. Sehr gut!
What a prude. There's no one else around, Kap!
*ALARM*
Would you look at that timing?
Maybe it's a sign...
A sign that it's time for battle. Nothing more.
Heh.
Let's go, Kapitän!
@BATTLE
Standing watch, Uzi?
Ja! You know it's one of my hobbies, Kappi.
What are you doing up here?
Brought you some news. Encrypted message for you, from Admiral Cutter.
That made my eyebrows jump. What does it say?
Don't know yet. We'll have to come inside to read it.
It might have to wait. We have a situation.
Spotted some Morganas?
Ja. Let's get into range, Kapitän.
@BATTLE
Good work, Uzi.
We're some kind of unstoppable, almighty couple. Aren't we, Kappi?
Warte kurz.
I-I thought we were... You know... a couple. Am I not your girlfriend?
I'm sorry - I feel like I've missed a bunch of really important conversations. What... I mean, what did I do that--
D-Don't you remember? When you called me your "beloved" partner?
You said that as long as I allow you, you'd be by my side. Remember?
Oh, wow. I'm just...
I'm gonna need to drift on out of here.
No, wait.
Please, Kappi. I have to go crawl away somewhere...
Absolutely.
... Wait. What exactly did you mean by "couple" there?

Fields.MenuText: I never thought about it like a formal sort of relationship-commencement speech.
I remember. And then you just kind of left to go do something else. It just seemed to fizzle out.
Yeah, but I say stuff like that all the time. It's how I inspire people.

Fields.DialogueText: Where'd she go? She must be really embarrassed from our last meeting.
Guess I'll make a tour of the ship without her. Honestly I wouldn't mind some Morganas showing up to distract me.
@BATTLE
Hey.
Oh... I didn't expect you to show up here.
Entschuldigung. I'll be out of your way, Kapitän.
No, that's not necessary...
Crap. Well, that's troubling.
Kapitän.
Er. Yes?
Permission to speak plainly, Kapitän.
Permission granted.
Kapitän, what the hell did you do!?
I'm not sure what you mean.
Don't play dumb! I've never seen her act this way before.
She seems absolutely devastated. I've never seen anything make her cry before!
Did you ask her about it?
I did, but...

Fields.MenuText: It was none of your business, right?
Good. Leave me alone.
What did she say?

Fields.DialogueText: Hmph...
Hey, I'm trying to tell you something important, Kapitän.
She... uh...
She said she humiliated herself in front of her commanding officer.
As far as I'm concerned, this is your responsibility.
Take a deep breath and try that again.
Right. Of course, Kapitän.
I'm just... concerned.
Noted - and rest assured I'll deal with it.
Yes, Kapitän.
You're dismissed, Lieutenant. Thank you for your concern.
Enemy reinforcements, incoming!
We don't back down, and we don't falter!
@BATTLE
I've had worse, but I've had better...
Uzi.
Ja, Kapitän?
Why are you hiding? Come out of there.
Did you... need something, Kapitän?
I wanted to clear the air.
Oh Gott, please don't do that.
Why?
I'm already ashamed enough as it is...
I don't want to relive it.

Fields.MenuText: But it's affecting our efficiency.
But it's making us both miserable.
But it's important to muddle through.

Fields.DialogueText: I doubt it.
What is?
Stop trying to play the shrink!
I just want to spend time with you again.
Oh... Kapitän. I'm not avoiding you just because of what happened.
You aren't? Are you sure?
Ha! You egocentric bum. No, we're fine. I moved a little bit fast for you, that's all. I'm a big girl, Kappi.
Then what is it?
Come back and talk to me about it later.
I need to take a breather from all of these emotions.
This distance between us.
Hey! What are you saying!?
Kapitän. Something's off.
Something else?
This straggler Nixe group we're chasing... something doesn't feel right about it.
Think we should stop?
Not quite.
What if it's a trap?
That's what I'm hoping for.
Hardly responsible of a seasoned Belle, Uzi.
Ja, ja. We're pretty strong, though.
Unnecessary risks lead to tactical blunders.
Guess I take too many risks then, heh...
Well, that's not quite what I'm saying.
I think... if we charge in, with our heads held high. If we take their bait, spring the trap without flinching...
Maybe we can crush their morale.
That's pretty severe.
You don't want to?

Fields.MenuText: I do want to.
I really don't like walking into traps. I just don't.

Fields.DialogueText: Then let's go.
That's not a no.
At least we're conversing again.
@BATTLE

Fields.MenuText: The alternative has them shelling Gotland in about ten hours. I don't think "want" enters into it.

Fields.DialogueText: Uzi. I wanted to follow up with you.
If you're feeling up to it, will you tell me what's going on?
Kapitän, I'm in mourning.
Has... Has something happened!?
Three of my sisters have been destroyed.
Is that what Admiral Cutter contacted you about? I never did see the message...
It was a related matter, but yes. The message.
Sorry, Uzi. I had no idea.
Ja, ich weiß. And... I know I shouldn't act like this.
They weren't woken Walküren like me. I probably shouldn't be so... depressed.

Fields.MenuText: Maybe. Maybe not.
I would be, if I were you.

Fields.DialogueText: And yet... I can't help but feel emptier now.
Not many feel that way about it.
My sisters... I can feel their presence, you know?
Sort of?
I mean, I can literally feel their condition, and their surroundings. It's faint, but it's there.
Interesting.
And now, it feels like I've lost an eye... I have these three huge blind spots in the water.
What if it leads to us not seeing an enemy? And what if that leads to me sinking like my sisters?
The crew is here for you. We keep our eyes open when you can't.
Doesn't quite fix things, but it helps. Thank you, Kapitän, for trying something to make me feel better.
Anything, Uzi.
Anything?
That look in your eye just now...
Relax. I'm not going to start kissing you again.
TIME FOR MURDER!
What?!
Enemies! I can sense them. C'mon, Kappi!
Looks like she can see just fine.
@BATTLE

Fields.MenuText: Losing friends or family is never easy.

Fields.DialogueText: Happens all the time in war, right? I shouldn't have been so surprised.
Hello there, Uzi.
Ah! Hallo, Kapitän.
Pleasant day, don't you think?
It's off to a decent start, anyway. Maybe it will hold up. Then again, our navigator is famously bad with weather reports.

Fields.MenuText: You're looking good.
You're looking well.
You're looking all right.

Fields.DialogueText: Heya! Danke, Kapitän!
Are you a doctor? If I wanted to talk to the sawbones, I'd be in sickbay, Kappi.
You can do better than that!
And, you're looking rather cool today, I'd say.
Thanks?
What's on the agenda for today?
We should be reaching our target's destination very soon.
Oho. We're making the first strike, this time!
Assuming, of course...
Ja, ja. The new navigator. Still, I've got some faith. Dead reckoning is good enough for me.
What is it?
I feel like we have some... unfinished business.
I do, but... it's still a bit raw, you know?
Too many emotions for you?
Nein, just one. Too much shame.
That's a discussion for later. If ever. Feels like the fight is going to happen sooner than the navigator calculated...
@BATTLE
Reporting for duty, Kapitän. Sounds like you were looking all over for me.
Something wrong?
So formal. It's like you're a different U-37.
Sounds like you get lonely easily for the real deal, Kappi.
And here she is.
Why were you looking for me?
You don't remember? We were finally going to talk about us?
Oh. Oh! Mist!
Are you... going to stall again?
Nein. Just...
Lay it on me, Kapitän. Shoot me down clean!

Fields.MenuText: You're my beloved partner.
Be my girlfriend.
Is that what you want?

Fields.DialogueText: Huh? Why are you...
Really?!
No...
Then we have an understanding, right?
I guess we do!
Uzi.
Ja, Kapitän?
We've reached our patrol area. I want us ready for combat.
Good. I've got some anxiety to take out on the enemy!
That's... candid!
Ha! Get used to that...
Let's go!
@BATTLE
Uzi, for as long as you allow me, I'll be by your side.
Oh, my. You made it a little bit strange, but... I think you're sincere.
... Took you long enough.
Erm... All right.
Then I won't.
You mean you won't have me as your girlfriend, or you won't shoot me down?
I'm not shooting you down, Uzi.
We're coming up on the target, Kapitän. The ship is ready.
Good. Ah, here comes our Belle.
Halloooooo, Kapitän...
Oh, God. I'll be at my post, Kapitän.
You looking forward to the next battle? I could use some action.

Fields.MenuText: Just in time, Uzi. We're at the coordinates.

Fields.DialogueText: @BATTLE
That wasn't even all that great...
What are you mumbling to yourself there?
That battle could have been executed better. That's all I'm saying.
Are you only going to respond with pithy bitterness today?
Perhaps someone in the crew is distracted.
Or... perhaps they don't care all that much.
What was that!?
Don't you say one negative thing about my crew!
My crew are my heroes!
That's not what I...
Damn it.
Maybe I'll save my comments for the next tactical brief.
I should go.
What's his problem?
Clueless as ever, Uzi.

Fields.MenuText: You've got a real appetite, don't you?
You're not the only one...

Fields.DialogueText: A deep, abiding craving, Kappi. *wink*
Wunderbar, Kapitän!
Yikes, Kappi! Haha!
What's on your mind, Kappi?
I'm a little surprised about your... innocence when it comes to dating.
I was under the impression that you've had lovers before.
Mein Gott. You aren't mincing any words, are you?
I've been on a few dates, I suppose.
I've had suitors that caught my interest but...
This is different.

Fields.MenuText: Why? What makes it different?
Because I'm special. Must be. My mother always told me so.
Maybe it isn't any different.

Fields.DialogueText: I don't know!
Ha ha ha! Oh, yes, Kapitän. I'm sure that's why.
I don't know much about that.
Anything else?
I'm beginning to wonder if you define relationships differently than I do.
Why?
Well, what do you expect of a romantic partner?
Huh? What do I expect...?
I expect you to be savvy in battle!
Well, that... did you say "battle?"
That's what's most important! You have my back, right?
That makes sense, I guess.
Then we're good. Expectations are aligned! And now you can prove it to me.
Incoming!
@BATTLE
Uzi? That look on your face can't be good. Either the mess hall is out of fruit, or you got some bad news.
I was just about to call you up here to show you the message. I've received word from Admiral Cutter.
What is it?
A large number of German U-boats have been actively targeted for sneak attacks.
What? How do Morganas even find stealthy submarines?
The Kriegsmarine... aren't revealing anything about the investigation.
Little reason for them to trust any of the other nations beyond the treaty, I suppose.
I've been instructed to be vigilant when any ship is in my sights. Nixe or human. Ally or not.

Fields.MenuText: Healthy suspicion, Uzi, but you know I'm only going to permit engagements against Morganas.

Fields.DialogueText: What a coincidence, Kapitän. That's exactly what we've got coming over the horizon!
@BATTLE
Have you noticed these battles are sometimes... noticeably more difficult?
Ja. And more fun, too.
Just be careful.
You're watching my back, remember? And now you can watch it go to the mess decks to get a snack...

Fields.MenuText: Submarines live or die by stealth. Giving our location up, even to allies, makes it easier for enemies to spot us.
Belles fighting Belles would be a nightmare.

Fields.DialogueText: Agreed. This is why you're my favorite, Kappi.
You don't have to tell me. I'd hate to point a torpedo at any of my sisters.
Let's creep up on that Morgana patrol like the silent hunters we are...
I found you a better target. Check the port side...
Kapitän. Another opportunity has arisen.
Opportunity for what? For us to do something as a couple?
I'll answer your question with another question.
What did I say I expect of a romantic partner?

Fields.MenuText: A kind heart.
Fun dates.
Battle prowess.

Fields.DialogueText: Pffft! If that's what I was looking for, I certainly wouldn't be dating you.
What kind of shallow harpy do you take me for!?
Exactly.
An opportunity to show me your valor!
Let me guess... enemy contacts? It would be easier just to sound the alarm, Uzi.
Ah, mein Schatz! You're finally learning.
@BATTLE
In the mood to celebrate being alive? Let's do something fun.
Sure. Where to?
Will you accompany me to my quarters?

Fields.MenuText: Oh! Finally. I've been looking forward to this.
Maybe that isn't such a good idea.
If that's what you want.

Fields.DialogueText: Eh? Why?
What's that supposed to mean? And why did you say it like that? What do you think is going to happen?
You're kind of clueless, aren't you?
C-Clueless!? Me!?
Heh. Maybe so. Just come to my quarters, and don't be weird. Just spend some time with me.
Then what is it?
Then what is it?
Exactly?
Wh-What do you mean by that?
Incoming Morganas. Prepare for battle!
@BATTLE
You have my sympathies for your loss. Or... whatever it is you feel.
I understand. Danke, I guess.
What a mess.
What mess? What's going on?
Ah...
Two more of my kin were felled.
Damn... That must have been the coded message from Admiral Cutter.
Ist schon gut. I already knew.

Fields.MenuText: The blindspots. You felt them.

Fields.DialogueText: Blindspots. Right.
Do you need anything?
Nein. I'd rather be alone right now.
I understand. Just... find me if there's anything I can do.

Fields.MenuText: None of them were active Belles, right?
You could sense them?

Fields.DialogueText: Nein. But I still feel the loss keenly.
Ja. I felt them fade away.
Uzi... We've got our tactics brief coming up, but I wanted to talk to you before we got wrapped up in things.
Ja, Kapitän?

Fields.MenuText: Hello.
How are you feeling?
Are you over it yet?

Fields.DialogueText: Heh. That was nonchalant. Did you write that all by yourself, or did you have help?
Mir geht es gut. I'm all right.
That's mighty tactless of you, Kapitän!
Ready for our ambush?
Ja! I'm ready to blow off some steam!
@BATTLE
Hmph. Sometimes the Nixen fail to leave an impression.
If they fail to leave big holes in the hull, too, then I can accept that.
No issues. Leutnant Bethke will have the last of the damage reports on your desk in a few minutes.
I'm feeling a little better now.
Kapitän, will you come play with me today?

Fields.MenuText: Let's play cards.
Let's go to your room.
Let's not.

Fields.DialogueText: Wunderbar! Come on, come on!
Let's go.
Aw. Phooey.
Kind of impressive, really. Heh.
Kapitän, I need to tell you something.
Of course. Anything.
You know...
The Kriegsmarine would never let U-boat technology fall into enemy hands.
Yes. From what I understand, we're being encouraged to destroy Morganas that have absorbed U-boat wrecks.
There's more.
I've known for a long time that after the war... the Kriegsmarine will have me scuttled.
A conscious Belle? I doubt it.
I have my duty to the Vaterland. I follow my orders, but...

Fields.MenuText: They'll order you to die?
You would follow orders like that?
What about us?

Fields.DialogueText: Normally, ja.
Ja. Indeed. Normally I would follow orders, but...
But?
I know I also have a duty to our romantic relationship.
I'm keeping my mind open.
Guess I'll have to rethink my plans of going on a rampage, dying in a blaze of glory.
Romantic duty? Sounds a little strange when you put it that way... but if it keeps you around, I'm in agreement.
Heh. Am I kidding? Am I not? Maybe it won't matter, if these Nixen put me down. Come on, my dear Kappi. To the bridge!
@BATTLE
I don't think we're meant to be immortal, Kappi. And I don't think they... fah. Why dwell on it?
Keep your eyes starboard. They're coming, I know it.
Got it. Can you hand me something to wipe my binoculars with? I've got a handkerchief somewhere...
Ah, thanks. Have all of the preparations been made?
Ja. We're ready!
Then we proceed as planned with our approach.
By the way...
Come see me after the mission.
Gerne!
@BATTLE
You wanted to see me, Kapitän?

Fields.MenuText: I'm playing the shrink again.
You have some messed up ideals.
This is tricky.

Fields.DialogueText: That always ends up swell.
What the hell do you mean by that?
Spit it out, Kap!
You would have followed orders to be scuttled.
I think it's all right for me to be concerned that...
That what?
That you don't quite value your life or happiness.
Okay, that's... heavy. Or maybe it's how I express my devotion. Ever think of that?
That was just off the top of my head. I'll need to think about it, Kapitän. You deserve a good answer.
That's fair.
Keine Angst. I'll give it real thought.
Yeah. I've been thinking about our conversation about you being scuttled.
Enough work. Hang out with me! C'monnnnnn.... Kap. Kap. Kappi...
Whoa!
You're absolutely sloshed, Uzi.
I'm no such thing, Matrose!
Pardon?
You! You insubordinate... Huh? Oof!
Didn't you hear!?
I've been promoted. I hold a higher position than you, Kapitän.
What position is that, pray tell?
Kapitän's Girlfriend! Salute me, peasant!
Whoa! Uzi, watch where you're walking!
*CRASH*
Are you all right!?
I'm good. Gut. I'm... I'm good. I just tripped on my shoes or something.
You worry too much, Kappi.

Fields.MenuText: You drink too much.
Worrying is how I show I care.
Maybe I should worry even more.

Fields.DialogueText: Phooey!
Oho. That's fair enough.
Heh. What a joke.
Where are you going?
La la la.
Please sober up before Morganas get here...
@BATTLE
It's only on rare occasions, I'd say.
Good to see you.
You, too, Kappi.
You seem to be letting loose lately.
I'm... feeling a lot freer.

Fields.MenuText: You could stand to be more serious.
I'm glad you're happier.
All thanks to me, I'm sure.

Fields.DialogueText: Understood, Kapitän!
It's been swell, but I think I should dial it back now.
Heh.
What is it?
There was something else that I wanted to tell you.
You wanted me to love myself, right? To love life?
But...
What is love? Ich verstehe es nicht.

Fields.MenuText: Love something by cherishing it.
Love something by fighting for it.
I... can't think of a good way to define it on the spot.

Fields.DialogueText: You want me to... cherish myself? To cherish life?
You want me to... fight for myself? To fight for life?
Nein?
Glad it's you by my side, Kappi.
It's kind of exciting. The idea of going against orders?! Boldly refusing to be sacrificed? This is new territory for me...
@BATTLE
I'm refreshed and ready for your orders, Kapitän!
It takes cool heads to muddle through conflict, I'd say.
That's likely the truth.
That actually sounds pretty challenging.
I really get that! That's inspirational!
That's a relief. I didn't want to be alone in my cluelessness.
What the hell!? Why are we swinging about?
*ALARM*
Uzi! What's going on!?
They came out of nowhere!
Get us ready to fight, Uzi!
Jawohl! I'm armed and ready to go!
@BATTLE
I'm not sure how that happened.

Fields.MenuText: We were caught off guard, that's all.
What happened?

Fields.DialogueText: That... doesn't really happen to me.
There was no sign of their approach. Not a hint.
Mark my words, this is a sign of something bigger!
I'll look into it.
It happens to everyone.
Everything seemed to indicate there was nothing for miles around!

Fields.MenuText: It's not the first time Morganas have ambushed a Belle.

Fields.DialogueText: Not me! Not like that!
Uzi. Just got a coded message. Seen it yet?
Nein. I haven't reviewed message traffic yet. What is it?
The ships we saw... the ones that ambushed us out of nowhere?
What of them?
They've been seen before. By other U-boats from your class. The most recent report was from U-38.
... Did the crew make it?
They're fine.
That ship must be blessed. To this day, it's still never had a single casualty.
But is that everything? You wouldn't have that look on your face if it was good news.
Apparently, the captain of U-38 heard the Morganas talking. It wasn't clear, but it didn't seem like the usual taunting babble.
And one of the Morganas kept coming after U-38 in particular.
Chased her around like it was a personal grudge. U-38's skipper had a hell of a time getting away from them.
*ALARM*
They've returned! Much sooner than I expected. They're hunting me with a vengeance, too. Just like U-38.
Look at that! See that configuration? It's got... what?! Are those merchant ship parts stuck all over the hull?
Made up of the wreckages of ships sunk by my sisters or something? So what if it is?!
Well, you know what? Before the war with the Morganas, my sisters and I were quite busy!
We U-boats took down a lot of ships!
Now if those verdammt ghosts want revenge, they're going to have to try really hard. I won't let them take me easily!
@BATTLE

Fields.MenuText: You'll want to see this one.
Stay on top of it. Sometimes the messages are urgent.

Fields.DialogueText: You should criticize, Kappi! I have to remind you about messages, too.

Fields.MenuText: You're falling behind in your duties.

Fields.DialogueText: I don't like how you said that. It gave me chills.
Urgent? Fine! Then stop wasting time and tell me what it says!
The charts are updated with the latest intel plots, Kapitän. Standing by for your review.
Good work, Bethke.
Hm... These Morgana positions don't give us a lot of choices...
I'm sure you'll just let U-37 do whatever she wants.
Lieutenant, I don't appreciate your tone.
Apologies, Kapitän...
If you've got a reason to be so damn bitter, let's have it.
What!?
I'm not...
Kapitän, did you need anything else?
No. You're dismissed. Try to get a few minutes in your rack before our next combat.
It won't be long...
@BATTLE
Damn! Not another one...
What is it, Uzi? Are you all right?
I've... gained another blindspot.
Another one of your sisters is-- Is she gone?
Lost at sea, Kapitän. She's gone.
Don't run off. Just catch your breath.

Fields.MenuText: That's what I thought.
Don't worry about it. You just need some rest.
Just joking with you a bit. You need to relax!

Fields.DialogueText: I guess so...
Yeah. You're probably right.
You made your point, Kapitän. No need to be unprofessional about it.
Danke. Maybe get me some coffee?
Sure. Take your time.
Who would have ever thought that this is how the mighty U-boote get picked off?
It can't be coincidental. They haven't taken operational losses like this before.
Which sister ship was lost? Was it U-38?
Heh. Of course not. She's blessed, remember? And I hope she stays that way forever.
We're still alive, too.
Somebody has to pay it back, Kapitän.
They want revenge on U-boats? Fine! I'll get revenge right back!
Perpetuate this cycle of violence? Jawohl! I raise my guns and volunteer!
I have no qualms with either way!
*ALARM*
Right on cue.
Feels like target practice... A snack before the true meal - but I am hungry for anything right now!
@BATTLE
Lieutenant Bethke, whatever are you doing here?
I wanted to talk to you.
I've been thinking about... what's best for U.
You know that she's important to me.
I regret to say, I've been immature during her time of need.

Fields.MenuText: You've got that right.
You're just hurting.

Fields.DialogueText: Sorry, Kapitän.
Thanks.
But I'm going to change. I'm going to become reliable.
You just watch!  People will look up to me the way they do to you.
Ja, your instincts are right, Kapitän. More than you know.
I really appreciate that, Kapitän. Thanks.

Fields.MenuText: You've been under pressure and you misspoke a couple of times. Nobody's holding it against you.
I believe it. You have potential, and I'm looking forward to seeing it develop.
It may take a few more kicks to your hindquarters, but we'll get you there.
I salute your resolve. Now do the work.

Fields.DialogueText: Yes, Kapitän!
I may not have all of my sisters' eyes in the water like I used to, but I can still sense you coming, Nixen!
Is it time?
They're here!

Fields.MenuText: Are you afraid?
I'm ready!

Fields.DialogueText: Not even a little!
Me, too, Kappi!
I'm actually... a little excited.
Oh?
I can defy fate. When I need closure, I can forge it for myself. Destiny? I'll steal the destiny I want!
They took away a part of me.
I'm taking it back.
They tried to blind me, but now I can see more than ever!
I'm gonna live on, for them!
For the crew! And for the Kapitän!
And most importantly... for myself!
@BATTLE

Fields.MenuText: Took `em long enough.

Fields.DialogueText: We're quite the team, aren't we?
Natürlich! There's no doubt about it!
I just can't help this feeling...
What is it?
I think I understand now.
And... I wanted to tell them to you, clearly.
I love myself. I love life. But also...
Mwah! Gotcha! Direct hit with a wet kiss!
I love you, Kappi.
Where are you going?
Do you even need to ask? We're not going to stay in bed all day! We have work to do.

Fields.MenuText: Yeah. I don't get it.
There is no one I'd rather have fight beside me.

Fields.DialogueText: Loosen up! We have another fight on our hands!
Hehe. I'm smitten.
I'll prepare the crew.
To the never-ending battlefield! To the wide blue sea!
To... a long life filled with unforgettable memories.
To you, Kappi. Now come here and get one more kiss before we have to fight...
I won't ever forget you said that.

Fields.MenuText: ... Let me try to make a case for staying in bed.
